pkgmetadata.longdescription: # win32-setctime[![Pypi version](https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/win32-setctime.svg)](https://pypi.python.org/pypi/win32-setctime) [![Python version](https://img.shields.io/badge/python-3.5%2B-blue.svg)](https://pypi.python.org/pypi/win32-setctime) [![Build status](https://img.shields.io/github/workflow/status/Delgan/win32-setctime/Tests/master)](https://github.com/Delgan/win32-setctime/actions/workflows/tests.yml?query=branch:master) [![License](https://img.shields.io/github/license/delgan/win32-setctime.svg)](https://github.com/Delgan/win32-setctime/blob/master/LICENSE)A small Python utility to set file creation time on Windows.## Installation```shellpip install win32-setctime```## Usage```pythonfrom win32_setctime import setctimesetctime("my_file.txt", 1561675987.509, follow_symlinks=True)```
